Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Reroute near Ashland/Congress
ShortDescription: #9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Ashland/Congress.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Ashland/Congress.

Northbound buses will operate via Ashland, Harrison, Damen, Jackson and Ashland, then resume their normal route.

Southbound buses will operate via Ashland, Van Buren, Damen, Harrison and Ashland, then resume their normal route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Kimball-bound Brown Line Service Delayed near Belmont
ShortDescription: Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are standing near Belmont due to a possible track switching problem Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are standing near Belmont due to a possible track switching problem.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#8 Halsted

#22 Clark

#152 Addison

#77 Belmont

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
